verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*:

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w moves|strong="H6275"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w overturns|strong="H2015"\w* \w them|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H3045"\w* anger.

\w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w restrain|strong="H7725"\w* \w His|strong="H7725"\w* anger; \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7293"\w* cower \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*.

Even if I \w were|strong="H6310"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*, \w my|strong="H6310"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* would \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w me|strong="H7561"\w*; if I \w were|strong="H6310"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8535"\w*, it would \w declare|strong="H6663"\w* \w me|strong="H7561"\w* \w guilty|strong="H7561"\w*.

Though \w I|strong="H3045"\w* am \w blameless|strong="H8535"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w concern|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w myself|strong="H5315"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

When \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w scourge|strong="H7752"\w* brings \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w He|strong="H6597"\w* \w mocks|strong="H3932"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w despair|strong="H4531"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w dread|strong="H3025"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sufferings; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w acquit|strong="H5352"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

Since \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am already found \w guilty|strong="H7561"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w labor|strong="H3021"\w* \w in|strong="H3021"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*?

then \w You|strong="H8581"\w* \w would|strong="H8008"\w* \w plunge|strong="H2881"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w* into \w the|strong="H2881"\w* \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, \w and|strong="H8581"\w* even my own \w clothes|strong="H8008"\w* \w would|strong="H8008"\w* \w despise|strong="H8581"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*.
